RANDON.TITLE: Financing & CDC Ecosystem
RANDON.DESC: Credit and backoffice solutions for fleet financing and Randon products.
RANDON.DEEP_DIVE:
I worked as a Software Engineer in a 6-person squad focused on the fleet financing ecosystem. We developed scalable credit solutions and backoffices using Next.js and NestJS under the BFF pattern.

As it is a high-criticality financial product, I had the experience of collaborating directly with Pentest teams. This interaction was key to mitigating risks and vulnerabilities in payment flows, ensuring architecture definitions were aligned with the strictest banking security standards.

On the frontend, we prioritized data integrity through complex validations with React Hook Form and Zod, ensuring a smooth and secure experience for the end user.

CNJ_PJE.TITLE: PJe: Procedural Search Modernization
CNJ_PJE.DESC: Refactoring and performance optimization for Brazil's largest judicial system.
CNJ_PJE.DEEP_DIVE:
I was part of the engineering team in an 8-person multidisciplinary squad, operating under Agile methodologies to modernize critical PJe modules. The core challenge was transitioning legacy components to a modern Angular architecture.

We focused on the procedural search engine, implementing Signals and RxJS to optimize asynchronous processing and interface reactivity.

This modernization, monitored via Lighthouse and focused on accessibility with Angular Material, resulted in a drastic reduction in API response times, ensuring the most accessed judicial system in the country delivered high performance to millions of users.

BARBER.TITLE: Smart Barber Manager
BARBER.DESC: Mobile SaaS focused on scheduling automation and revenue management.
BARBER.DEEP_DIVE:
This project is a case study on creating a profitable MVP. Using React Native (Expo) and Node.js, we implemented a subscription management system (Quarterly, Semi-annual, and Annual) based on Revenue Management patterns.

The subscription handling was structured to support different billing cycles, balancing operational costs and scalability. More than just a management tool, the project serves as a technical 'blueprint', where I document everything from database architecture to real-world market launch strategies.

LAB.TITLE: Portfolio & Engineering Lab
LAB.DESC: R&D core focused on Clean Architecture and IA-Driven Development.
LAB.DEEP_DIVE:
This lab is my personal experimentation space, where Clean Architecture is applied in its purest form with Angular 19. As a 'one-man squad', I use AI Code Review tools (such as CodeRabbit) to maintain technical rigor and the quality of every Pull Request.

The project integrates social login and the Spotify SDK to create a productive 'flow' environment, but its true power lies behind the scenes: an Edge Computing infrastructure via Cloudflare that ensures resilient performance.

Real-World Results: The effectiveness of this architecture is proven by the data below. Even without marketing investment, the technical SEO and internationalization (i18n) led to global organic reach, with over 45% of traffic coming from the US and Core Web Vitals reaching the state-of-the-art in performance.

IMAGES.CAPTION: Global Reach: Real-world validation of the internationalized architecture with 51 organic visits from the US.
Elite Performance: 700ms LCP (Largest Contentful Paint), 3x faster than industry excellence standards.
Cross-Platform Consistency: Stable and seamless experience across multiple operating systems including Windows, iOS, Linux, and Android.

CNJ_RPV.TITLE: Court-Ordered Payments Management (Sispreq)
CNJ_RPV.DESC: National architecture for unification and transparency of federal judicial payments.
CNJ_RPV.DEEP_DIVE:
I worked on the development of Sispreq within a robust 30-person squad, structured under the Scrum framework. The project is a pillar of Justice 4.0, unifying judicial payment flows nationwide.

In the stack, we used Angular 17+ (Signals/RxJS) on the frontend and Java with Spring Boot on the backend to sustain complex business rules. The project's success culminated in an official presentation by Chief Justice Barroso, highlighting the solution's impact on the Brazilian judiciary in partnership with the UNDP (UN).

Below, you will find impact metrics, reference links, and records of this success case that redefines public financial transparency.
